title: BONUS: Goodbye, Climate Jargon. Hello, Simplicity!
description: People are likely to be confused by climate change terms like "mitigation" and "carbon neutral," according to a recent study. Yet, these terms are ubiquitous in climate research and reports that are meant to be accessible to a general audience.
copyright: Copyright 2020-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
itunes:title: BONUS: Goodbye, Climate Jargon. Hello, Simplicity!
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: A recent study found that some of the most common terms in climate science are confusing to the general public.
itunes:subtitle: A recent study found that some of the most common terms in climate science are confusing to the general public.
content:encoded: People are likely to be confused by climate change terms like "mitigation" and "carbon neutral," according to a recent study. Yet, these terms are ubiquitous in climate research and reports that are meant to be accessible to a general audience.
